allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add JD deduplication: skip fetching JDs already in database

- Add filter_urls_needing_jd\(\) method for batch URL checking
- Filter out jobs with complete JDs before fetching
- Support re-fetching for jobs with empty descriptions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Improve job filtering and scoring rules \(v2.0\)

- Add Dutch language detection \(word-count based, threshold 8\)
- Add non-target role filter \(title whitelist/blacklist\)
- Add freelance/ZZP detection
- Add low compensation detection
- Improve wrong_tech_stack \(separate title vs body checks\)
- Lower base score to 3.0, add title-based scoring with category caps
- Add tiered company bonuses \(Tier 1: +2.0, Tier 2: +1.5, Tier 3: +1.0\)
- Add non-core tech penalty \(-2.0\)
- Add --reprocess flag to clear old results and reprocess all jobs
- Add clear_filter_results\(\) and clear_scores\(\) to job_db.py

Results: 59/76 rejected \(was 35\), 17 passed with better precision

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
